title: Bitcoin Holding, While Solana on the Edge
description: Market Overview The crypto market capitalisation fell to $2.91T (-2.4% for the day). title: Bitcoin’s silent exodus hits crypto as long-time buyers cash out
description: More than two months after the token hit a record high above US$126,000, it has fallen nearly 30% and is struggling to find support
